original_text: Mine eye runneth down with rivers of water for the destruction of the daughter of my people.
korean_text: 딸 내 백성의 파멸로 말미암아 내 눈에는 눈물이 시내처럼 흐르도다

sentences.original_text: Mine eye runneth down with rivers of water
for destruction of daughter of my people
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성의 딸이 망하게 됨을 인하여
